person.bio: Experienced Managing Director with a demonstrated history of working in the information services industry since 1995. Skilled in Negotiation, Coaching, Sales and Management. Strong business development professional with a Post-Graduate, focused in Sales and Marketing Management. I believe in the great idea of the ThreeFold Foundation, it nurtures my believe we can live in a better world.
person.excerpt: Director Sales EMEA, Enterprise & Partner Sales at Syniverse
